John Smith

#7 Flanker
Height 185cm
Weight 95kg
Debut 2021
Games 45
Tries 12

Biography

John has been a key player for Footscray since 2021. Known for his speed and tactical awareness, he's a vital part of our forward pack.

Footscray Rugby Club

Melbourne's premier community rugby club. Join us for rugby, friendship, and tradition in the heart of the western suburbs.
